name: Robot Panic
description:
This is my very first game, and also my submission for the Wowie Jam 4.0 (obviously my first Game Jam) : Robot Panic

In this top-down shooter, you play as a robot with one goal: survive waves of rampaging robots! By repairing your fellow robots, you ensure a reliable and useful collaboration.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aim

Left mouse button - Shoot

E - Repair inactive robots

To be more in the theme (no actually I would never have had the time to make a complete music in a week end), I used MuseNet from OpenAI to compose the music . I also use sfxr to make the sound effects. Finally, I used a particle asset from the Unity Asset Store from Synty Studios.

I'm quite proud of myself, especially since I could only work half-time the first two days, and not at all the third one: you can almost say that I made this game in 2 days!

Have fun !
